And2Gate - class model.And2Gate.
And2Gate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a two-input AND gate.
And2Gate(Model) - Constructor for class model.And2Gate
Constructs a solitary new And2Gate object.
And2Image - class gui.And2Image.
And2Image extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to And2Gate.
And2Image() - Constructor for class gui.And2Image
Constructs a new instance of And2Image, used by the toybox.
And2Image(Gui, Point) - Constructor for class gui.And2Image
Constructs a new instance of And2Image with a given location in the sandbox.
